StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary:
A certified Scrum Master and an experienced software engineer with a passion for developing
innovative programs that expedite the efficiency and effectiveness of organizational success. Well-
versed in technology and writing code to create systems that are reliable and user-friendly. Skilled
leader who has the proven ability to motivate, educate, and manage a team of professionals to build
software programs and effectively track changes. Confident communicator, strategic thinker, and
innovative creator to develop software that is customized to meet a company's organizational needs,
highlight their core competencies, and further their success.

PositionHistory.Title: Senior Platform Engineer(Team Lead and Scrum Master)
PositionHistory.Description:
Projects
Merchant Management
With Merchant Management, you can set up flows and payouts that best suit your platform. As a software
platform, you may want your individual users to set up their own merchant accounts. If you are a marketplace
platform, you may be collecting the payment and routing payouts to multiple users. You can generate revenue by
collecting a percentage-based fee per transaction, or split payouts for credit and debit card transactions and bank transfers.

Technologies used-:Apache Spark, AWS, Scala, Core JAVA 8, SpringBoot, SpringData JPA, REST, AngularJS, Maven.


Duties and responsibilities-
• Working with users to establish requirements and determine priorities.
• Meeting client's face to face at their offices.
• Developing new applications, components & functionality to existing systems.
• Analyzing data and conducting compatibility and quality assurance testing.
• Identifying & addressing conflicts with newer client-implemented software.
• Investigating alternate configurations & implementing better solutions.
• Designing, developing, testing & configuring for a custom pre-authenticated scenario.
Global Logic - Noida , UP (1 year)
Senior Conslutant(Team Lead and Scrum Master)
Projects
Providie
This is a modular platform targeted towards customer care, sales, and service desk processes for end users,
company employees, and citizens in the public sector. With more than 350 clients in 17 countries, its handles
around 3bn interactions per year, including voice, messaging, email, video chats, social media messages, SMS,
and IoT transactions. It has four modules:
Contact Center for omnichannel routing, recording, WFM, and quality monitoring
Concierge, an omnichannel (voice and digital) bot, designed for self-service and qualification
Campaign suite to push messages for marketing campaigns and notifications
Analytics for customer insights.

Delphix GDPR
The Delphix Dynamic Data Platform creates a comprehensive library of data sources with the ability to pinpoint the location of sensitive data that resides in both on-prem data centers and cloud-based environments such as
AWS and Azure. The Delphix platform is preconfigured to identify data values subject to GDPR, but is also
adaptable to an organization's unique definitions of what is considered personal, confidential information.
Provision data in just minutes and to any environment--whether on premises or in the cloud. With
sophisticated automation, pre-built integrations with DevOps tools, and integrated security, Delphix gives end
users self-service data controls such as the ability to refresh or recover data to any point in time

Delphix ApplicationAccelerator
Streamline access to data for analytics and reporting. Delphix continually captures production data--down to the millisecond--and stores it in a space-efficient manner for days, weeks, or months. Retrieve point-in-time
data while avoiding lengthy batch processes, removing data blindspots that impact artificial intelligence,
machine learning, and compliance programs.
Technologies used-:Core JAVA 8, AWS, SpringBoot, SpringData JPA, REST, AngularJS, Maven.
Duties and responsibilities-
• Working with users to establish requirements and determine priorities.
• Meeting client's face to face at their offices.
• Developing new applications, components & functionality to existing systems.
• Analyzing data and conducting compatibility and quality assurance testing.
• Identifying & addressing conflicts with newer client-implemented software.
• Investigating alternate configurations & implementing better solutions.
• Designing, developing, testing & configuring for a custom pre-authenticated scenario.
KaphaAnalytics

Cofounder and Technical Architect -1.7 Years

Projects
The platform for ratings and reviews of enterprise technology solutions by end-user professionals for end-user
professionals.
We are bringing together our expert opinion and the user-contributed reviews into one experience via the Interactive dashboard.

For technology buyers, the Interactive dashboard User Reviews offers:
Insights from experts and peers
The full spectrum of expert research and advice and user ratings & reviews in one convenient location.

A suite of interactive features
Along with the new User Reviews tab, the Interactive dashboard continues to allow users to customize the evaluation criteria ratings to create a quadrant view unique to their goals and priorities.

Count on KaphaAnalytics for rigorous methodologies, processes and quality standards that deliver unbiased
research and authentic peer reviews.

Technologies used-: Core JAVA 8 , AWS, Apache Spark , SpringBoot ,Hibernate,REST ,ElasticSearch , MongoDB ,
Maven


Bharti Airtel ,Gurgaon
Senior Software Engineer (JAVA/J2EE , ElasticSearch) - 1 Year


Projects
Real time log reporting and alerting Framework (ELK stack)
Single-handedly developed a framework which does the real time log reporting.
This framework analysis real time logs and generate nice colorful visualization of reports after the analysis.
For example the TPS , Top 10 consumed APIs , Average response time per API.
This is very helpful in determining the performance and log monitoring of any application.
This framework also generates alerts based up on the requirement and criticality criterian
Technologies used-: JAVA,SpringMVC , Hibernate ,AngularJS , Filebeat , Elastic Search , Logstash , Kibana ,
ElastAlerts , REST ,Maven


Search Solution Using Elastic Search
Single handedly developed the efficient search solution with TPS of more than 1000.It searches mobile
numbers based on any given number of digits , containing those digits.
The development involved end -to-end solution including Clustering and data retention.
This solution is being used on the official website of the organization as well as in internal projects where
required.
Technologies used-: Core Java,SpringMVC,AngularJS,Elastic Search , Curator.


Exception Handling Framework
Single-handedly developed a framework which handles all type of exceptions and used across the organization in every software module and project.
This framework gives flexibility to developers to define their own error codes and error messages dynamically.
Technologies used-: Spring , Core Java , REST ,Maven


M2M
It's a portal which enables customer to manage SIM related activities like allocation , activation , deactivation ,
adding SIM to baskets , defining own baskets etc. There is an administrator module which gives many advanced
functionalities like bulk upload of SIMs and assigning SIMs to respective circles and cater their overall
management.
This portal was designed to cut the Call Centre costs.
I was involved in architecture and development.
Technologies used-: Apache Spark , Hive ,Spring MVC ,Core JAVA, SOAP, AngularJS ,REST ,Maven.


PolicyBazaar.com
Senior Technology Associate (SpringMVC , REST , Apache Spark , Hadoop)-1.1 Years


Projects
ELK (Audit Logs Analyser)
Independently developed a solution which shows real time audit log reports on KIBANA.
This is an any-log-parser which can be used for any application without doing much modification dynamically. I have
used regular expressions to parse logs with help of logstash plugins.
This solution is my copyright and is in process of patent.
Technologies used-: Java , SpringMVC , ElasticSearch , Logstash , Kibana ,and Cuartor.


Investment
Involved in setting up right architecture for flexible, scalable and long-lasting system.
Developed a framework to give a complete end to end solution to enable multiple insurance purchases in Term and Investment Customer Journey.
Key features - Front end: Dynamic form (UI) creation using json stored in mongodb. Front end is supported by
angular-js.
General validations and special validation handled in run time using the algorithms performed on preloaded json.
Implemented Algorithm to handle data preparation for web service consumption.
Transformation and conversion of data to communicate and validation.
Complete revamp of Health Insurance Customer Journey
Key features:
Multiple health insurance purchase in a go based upon multiple Profile create.
Multiple Attachment (Super Top-up, Critical Illness) support.
Roles and Responsibilities-:
Interface between Business and Technology.
Technologies used-:Apache Spark ,Hadoop ,AngularJS,Spring MVC ,Core JAVA, Javascript , MongoDB , REST ,Maven.


Nagarro Software , Gurgaon, India
Senior Associate Technology -8 Months

Projects
Electronic Banking User
Worked with other developers for a Leading investment bank and developed a banking application. The
application maintains the data of the customers of the bank and facilitates various operations like real time
transactions, generating reports, equity trading.
Tools Used-Eclipse Indigo, Oracle Weblogic. Putty, SVN, JIRA, Jenkins
Model- Agile Scrum

FaceBook Sentimental Analyzer
Developed an application called FACEBOOK COMPARISON POC for the investment bank which compares one
bank with another in terms of LIKES, COMMENTS, ACTIVITY (PEOPLE TALKING ABOUT) considering real time
data.
Involved in training freshers for various technologies like MVC framework, AngularJS , D3.JS ,UML etc.
Technologies used-: Spring MVC , Hibernate, D3.JS , Core JAVA, jQuery ,openXMA.

Equity And Derivatives
Worked with other developers for a Leading investment bank on an application which manages equity and derivatives for a user portfolio. The investment in both equity and derivatives is managed and based on some
algorithms , user would be able to choose the best out of it.
Tools Used-Eclipse Indigo, Oracle Weblogic. Putty, SVN, JIRA, Jenkins
Model- Agile Scrum
Technologies used-: Spring MVC , Hibernate, D3.JS , Core JAVA, jQuery, openXMA


Hcentive Technology India Private Limited
Consultant Technology (JAVA)- 8 Months

Projects
Sending Customized Assertions using SAML
The data of an individual user was required to be sent to the CMS of US govt to check the	of a particular user for a particular opted Health Plan.
Implemented SAML to send customized assertions for the same.
I have made my own library which is generic and can send any customized assertion for any use	case.
Broker Exchange System
A connected, integrated capability for the sales team with rich proposal creation and CRM functionality
relevant to various market segments
Pre-configured carrier relationships that assist in streamlining overall time to market
handling enrollment, billing and benefit admin functions
Self service, guided decision support and intuitive help throughout the process of benefit shopping,
enrollment and payment
Technologies used-: Spring MVC , SpringData , jQuery , AngularJS.
Sapient Corporation
Associate, Technology (JAVA) 1 year 10 months

Projects
Wellington Management , Portfolio Management
The application enables analysts and users to make the right decision in the unpredictable nature of the stock
market.
Technologies used -: Spring MVC, JSP, CSS, JDBC.

Resource Management , Wellington management
Build a Resource Management System for a reputed which keeps track of performance at employee level. It
is a tool to accelerate performance at organization level. It gives management both macroscopic and microscopic view about how the organization is performing against its objectives.
It provides weekly, monthly and quarterly reports.
Technologies used -: Spring MVC, HTML, CSS, JQuery, Hibernate.

Electronic Banking Management-: This is internal application for banks internal use. Bank	advisors use it to manage customers, their accounts, institutes and other important things.
Technologies used -: Spring MVC, JSP, CSS, JDBC.

Worked on a business application which measures and reports productivity to clients	considering
various parameters.
The application captures some essential parameters like, for example, time taken by	employee to
complete a particular task versus time assigned, and on the basis of these	parameters it derives the productivity quotient.
The application provides reports (as per the need of the client) to clients on daily-basis via emails, like for
example clients wants to know that how many trade blotters are being executed today.
Technologies used-: Spring MVC, Hibernate, MySQL.

Duties and responsibilities-
• Development of Java interfaces.
• Working with users to establish requirements and determine priorities.
• Meeting client's face to face at their offices.
• Developing new applications, components & functionality to existing systems.
• Involved in accurately providing estimated development times.
• Developing new functionalities, both back-end and front-end.
• Analyzing data and conducting compatibility and quality assurance testing.
• Identifying & addressing conflicts with newer client-implemented software.
• Investigating alternate configurations & implementing better solutions.
• Designing, developing, testing & configuring for a custom pre-authenticated scenario.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 57% of this job

sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:Description: Sukrit Kalia's experience appears to be mostly concentrated in Information Technology (mostly Big Data) and slightly concentrated in Finance (mostly Compliance). Sukrit Kalia's experience appears to be entry level, with 8 months of experience.
